message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's a unique opportunity that I believe would greatly benefit you. Considering its value to you, I propose a price of $9,500 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us.

Alice, thanks for the offer. While I appreciate the product, $9,500 is a bit steep for me.  I'm willing to pay $8,500. I believe this is a fair price that benefits both of us. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position, and I appreciate your willingness to meet halfway. In light of this, I am proposing a price of $9,000 for the product. I believe this offers a reasonable compromise that respects both our interests.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down on your price. While $9,000 is closer, I'm still hoping to get a better deal.  I'm willing to go up to $8,750. This would be a significant saving for me and I'm sure we can both be happy with that outcome.

I appreciate your continued interest in the product, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to agree on a price of $8,900 for the product. I believe this price reflects the value of the product while also considering your budget constraints. I hope this proposal meets your expectations and allows us to move forward with the transaction.
